# Format numbers to two digits
inline_hook <- function(x) {
  if (is.numeric(x)) {
    format(x, digits = 2, big.mark = "'")
  } else {
      x
  }
}

# Automatically crop PDF plots
knitr::knit_hooks$set(
    inline = inline_hook,
    crop = knitr::hook_pdfcrop)
